text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi @narendramodi @PMOIndia These are difficult times, we need 100% Lockdown #OneNation #OneLockdown. The #farmers are saving us at these difficult times. To keep the war against #coronavirus going.., we need the farmers, doctors, and all necessary people fighting the war. As we did. https://t.co/MWaS1BCDXF
